name: DocumentProcessor
description: Handles advanced document processing tasks. Supports .docx, .pptx, and .pdf files.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: create_docx_from_text
actions.description: Creates a new .docx Word document from the provided text content.

parameters.name: text_content
parameters.description: The text to be included in the document

parameters.name: save_path
parameters.description: Absolute path (including filename.docx) to save the generated document

actions.name: append_to_docx
actions.description: Appends text or other elements to an existing .docx document.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Absolute path to the existing .docx file

actions.name: create_pptx_from_slides_data
actions.description: Creates a new .pptx PowerPoint presentation from structured slide data.

parameters.name: slides_data
parameters.description: Array of slide objects, each defining title, content, and layout

parameters.name: save_path
parameters.description: Absolute path (including filename.pptx) to save the presentation

actions.name: extract_text_from_pdf
actions.description: Extracts text content from a .pdf file.

parameters.name: pdf_save_path
parameters.description: Absolute path (including filename.pdf) to save the converted PDF
